title: Katie Price's husband Kieran Hayler once saved her life after she was dragged out to sea
text:
Katie Price's husband Kieran Hayler once saved her life after she was dragged out to sea She shared the story alongside news articles about Cape Verde Share Katie Price says it's thanks to husband Kieran Hayler that she's alive (Photo: Instagram) Share Get celebs     
Katie Price says she would be dead if it wasn't for her husband Kieran Hayler. 
The mum-of-five shared a story with her fans about the time Kieran dragged her from the sea when she was pulled out by the waves. 
Katie posted a link to a news article to her 2.07 million Twitter followers about Cape Verde in Boa Vista. 
The story was about how holidaymakers have hit out at a travel company for 'falsely advertising' a beach holiday after finding out it was too dangerous for them to swim in the sea. 
And the Loose Women star, 38, revealed that she once had a close call in the treacherous waters. 
She wrote: "Omg this is where I got knocked out in the see from the waves and if it wasn't for kieran pulling me out I would have been dead". [sic] Read More Katie says she's be dead if it wasn't for Kieran (Photo: Getty Images Europe) Kieran saved her life by pulling her out of the sea (Photo: Twitter) 
One fan said they'd also experienced the danger. 
They wrote: "same thing happened to me on that beach when we stayed at the Touareg. Loved the hotel though, but the sea was frightening!x" 
Meanwhile, Katie finally forgave Kieran for cheating on her. 
The former glamour model had repeatedly told her hubby she would always bear a grudge after he was unfaithful with her friend Jane Pountney in 2014, but after realising how much he has changed, she no longer holds his infidelity against him. 
Speaking on Loose Women, she confessed: "I trust him and for our wedding anniversary this year, I always said 'I never forgive, I never forget'. Read More Katie Price has FINALLY forgiven Kieran Hayler for cheating on her with best friend Jane Pountney in 2014 Katie has forgiven Kieran for cheating on her (Photo: WireImage) 
"I have now actually said to him 'I now forgive you, I do forget' because I got to a point where I don't have to worry about him. 
"He's changed so much, he's proven himself and the best I could do is stay with him." 
The 38-year-old star - who has kids Jett, three, and Bunny, two, with Kieran and 14-year-old Harvey, Junior, 11, and Princess, nine, from previous relationships - went on to reveal Kieran has now returned to social media for the first time since he was unfaithful after he and the therapist he saw for sex addiction treatment previously agreed it was best to remove temptation and stay away from the sites.
